Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Letter Change

Entries.summer_10: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Potluck.^^The highlight of the event is the communal soup. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -Mayor Lewis[#]Potluck Notice

Entries.Elliott: I woke up late, stepped out of the door and found myself in the middle of all this hubbub!#$e#I forgot that today was the Potluck.$h

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Lewis Start Soup Tasting

Entries.Event.cs.1527: $q -1 null#Should we move forward with the Potluck? The governor seems a little hungry.#$r -1 0 yes#Yes, let's start.#$r -1 0 no#Not yet.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Abigail Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Everyone's excited for the Potluck tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Alex Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the Potluck soup?#$e#I have no idea what's good... you're the chef!$h

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Elliott Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I was going to grab an extra bottle of ink from my cabin today, but then I remembered the Potluck is tomorrow. I'll just do it then.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Harvey Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the Potluck soup?#$e#I would put an item of high value and quality. We all want to leave a great impression on the governor!

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Sam Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the Potluck soup?#$e#It might be funny to put something nasty. You know, to play a prank on the governor!$h#$e#Sorry...

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Sebastian Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the Potluck soup?#$e#I have no idea what's good... you're the chef!$7

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Shane Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I might fast until the Potluck tomorrow. I need the ol' bag to be empty so I can fill it with piping hot soup.$h

Entries.Elliott: The smell of food woke me up this morning.$h#$b#I had forgotten all about the Potluck!$n#$b#It's a good thing I remembered to close my curtains last night.$l

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Festival Day Dialog Richard and Kenneth

Entries.Richard: It's humbling to consider how old a tradition the Pelican Town Potluck is for the valley.#$b#It came before me, and will be here long after I'm gone.#$e#Anytime we can all come together is truly a special time.$h
Entries.Kenneth_spouse: I offered to help, but I think Ian likes carrying the Potluck pot down here. #$b#Big guy gets a workout AND a feast! $h#$e#Who am I to get in the way of a man and his work?$h

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Alissa Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Every summer, the Pelican Town Potluck festival is the one event I really get excited about!$h#$b#I can't wait to show off my farm's crops tomorrow!$l
Alissa.Dialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Maddie Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Have you made your preparations for the Pelican Town Potluck?#$b#You better bring something good if you want to impress the Governor.$7
Maddie.Dialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Trinnie Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Potluck day!#$b#Soup day!$u#$e#Yummy food is coming our way!$h
Trinnie.Dialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Undreya Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I always attend the Pelican Town Potluck. I love the soup!$h#$b#I also like the spare change that purple balloon has.#$b#He should visit more often.$h
Undreya.Dialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Ysabelle Dialog

Entries.summer_1: I'm looking forward to this season.#$b#The warm beach and the dresses remind me of dancing as a little girl in summer shows.$h
Entries.summer_10: My granddad is quite excited for the festival tomorrow.#$b#He enjoys the Pelican Town Potluck so much!$h#$e#I think the governor is more excited than anyone else, because when the soup is good, it's really good!$h
Ysabelle.Dialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Corine Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Papa is always so talkative about what he'll bring for the Pelican Town Potluck tomorrow.#$e#He won't admit it, but he really is excited.$h
Corine.MarriageDialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Jeric Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I need your help picking something out for the Pelican Town Potluck tomorrow, @.#$b#Gotta pick the finest, every time.$7
Jeric.MarriageDialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck RSV Kenneth Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I've been working with Maru to create a machine to help move the Potluck pot for tomorrow.#$b#Poor Ian always gets so worn out carrying the thing he passes out in the sand after we eat, ha ha!$h
Kenneth.MarriageDialogue.summer_10

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Abigail Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Everyone's excited for the Potluck tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.
Entries.summer_10_2: Everyone's excited for the Potluck tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Emily Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Hey, look for me tomorrow at the Potluck. I'll greet you, but probably not in the way you're used to.
Entries.summer_10_2: Hey, look for me tomorrow at the Potluck. I'll greet you, but probably not in the way you're used to.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Evelyn Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Mayor Lewis always gets so nervous for the Potluck. Be sure to show him some support.#$e#The best way to do that is simply to bring something delicious for the soup.
Entries.summer_10_2: Mayor Lewis always gets so nervous for the Potluck. Be sure to show him some support.#$e#The best way to do that is simply to bring something delicious for the soup.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Gus Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I've got some good dishes prepped for the Potluck tomorrow, but I try to steer clear of the communal soup.#$e#It's really a hit-and-miss tradition, and I'd rather play it safe when it comes to my reputation.$s
Entries.summer_10_2: I've got some good dishes prepped for the Potluck tomorrow, but I try to steer clear of the communal soup.#$e#It's really a hit-and-miss tradition, and I'd rather play it safe when it comes to my reputation.$s

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Haley Dialog

Entries.summer_12: Did you see Emily yesterday at the Potluck? So ridiculous.$11
Entries.summer_12_2: Did you see Emily yesterday at the Potluck? So ridiculous.$11

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Haley Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_12: I like dancing, but when Emily does her thing at the Potluck, it's actually more fun for me just to watch.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Harvey Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I really hope nobody gets sick from the communal soup at tomorrow's Potluck.#$e#Potentially, it's a disaster waiting to happen. But this town sure loves its traditions.
Entries.summer_10_2: I really hope nobody gets sick from the communal soup at tomorrow's Potluck.#$e#Potentially, it's a disaster waiting to happen. But this town sure loves its traditions.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Lewis Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I didn't sleep much last night. The Potluck is always the most stressful festival of the year for me.#$e#Don't let that get in the way of you having a good time, though!$h
Entries.summer_28: I think tonight's festival is my favorite because I don't have to worry about a thing. The moonlight jellies do all the work for me!$h#$e#It's a nice change of pace after the Potluck earlier this month.
Entries.summer_28_2: I think tonight's festival is my favorite because I don't have to worry about a thing. The moonlight jellies do all the work for me!$h#$e#It's a nice change of pace after the Potluck earlier this month.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Linus Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I think I might take a risk tomorrow at the Potluck and share a little of my cooking.
Entries.summer_10_2: I think I might take a risk tomorrow at the Potluck and share a little of my cooking.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Penny Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Mmm... I can already almost taste the food at tomorrow's Potluck.#$e#I just hope no one ruins the soup this year...$a#$e#That's one reason why I don't hang out with Sam as much as I used to.$a
Entries.summer_10_2: Mmm... I can already almost taste the food at tomorrow's Potluck.#$e#I just hope no one ruins the soup this year...$a#$e#That's one reason why I don't hang out with Sam as much as I used to.$a

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Year 2 Festival George and Elliott Dialog

Entries.George: I liked the Potluck better, back when we didn't have those big electronic speakers ruining the atmosphere of the beach.#$e#This was... oh, twenty, twenty-five years ago.
Entries.Elliott: I didn't forget about the Potluck this year!$h#$e#Well, Leah reminded me, anyway. That helped.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck CFDE Year 3 Festival Robin and Pierre Dialog

Entries.Robin: Oh, hi @! It wouldn't be a proper beachside potluck without a little dancing, would it?$h
Entries.Pierre: If we ever get a storm on Potluck day, we could always host the Governor in my store.#$e#...What? I could make it work.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck FarmerJack Penny Dialog

Entries.summer_Tue2: Oh, hey there.#$e#The Potluck is a fun summer tradition, but my mom and I never seem to have anything tasty to bring.$3

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck FarmerJack Shane Married Dialog

Entries.summer_10: I might fast until the Potluck tomorrow. I need the ol' bag to be empty so I can fill it with piping hot soup.$h

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Jean and Jorts Jorts Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Have you picked out what you're going to put in the Potluck soup?#$b#If not, I bet a really high quality sturgeon would be great. Everyone would like that!$h

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Arknir Lucikiel Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Heh, I have a big surprise waiting for the Potluck soup.$u#$b#Oh come now, you've got to leave a man with a few mysteries.$u

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck TheLimeyDragon Ayeisha Dialog

Entries.summer_11: Everyone should be going to the Potluck on the beach.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Lemurkat Ranch Expansion Marnie Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Oh, there's so much to do today! Mayor Lewis has me organizing the communal soup at the Potluck.#$e#I'm sure you've got some fine produce to add!
Entries.summer_10_2: Oh, there's so much to do for the Potluck tomorrow!#$e#I'm sure you've got some fine produce to add!
Entries.summer_12: Oh dear, I don't know about you, @, but I ate far too much at the Potluck!
Entries.summer_12_2: Oh dear, I don't know about you, @, but I ate far too much at the Potluck!

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Lemurkat East Scarpe Aideen Dialog

Entries.summer_10: The Potluck? It is so chaotic! Not like the dinner parties I attended in Grampleton.#$b#Now, those were civilized affairs. None of this pitch-in nonsense.

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Lemurkat Jasper Dialog

Entries.summer_10: A good friend insisted that I keep them company at the Potluck tomorrow.$3#$b#But what have I to contribute to the soup, @? I rather doubt that cave carrots would be appreciated.$2

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Lemurkat Jasper Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_11: Oh, I am actually looking forward to the Potluck today, my love!$1#$b#With you by my side, I truly feel part of the community.$3

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Lemurkat Tristan Dialog

Entries.summer_Wed10: Once during the Potluck, we slipped in some of that red mushroom.#$b#Nobody died, thank Yoba, but let's just say... things got very interesting. And not in a good way.$2#$b#We were idiot kids... it's going to take a while for people to trust me.$2

Changes.LogName: Pelican Town Potluck Mando Marriage Dialog

Entries.summer_10: Don't forget the Potluck tomorrow.#$b#Grogu loves the beach.
